Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
We are a small two person Dev team working hard to make Brookhaven the best it can be.
Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":620394,"totalDownVotes":47495,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":69280,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3783435,"totalDownVotes":311950,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":68803,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":910011,"totalDownVotes":57850,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[UPDATE 50 + 2x EXP] Shindo","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":38731,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"UPDATE 50:

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":531378,"totalDownVotes":37341,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":32898,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":26801,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"탈옥수와 경찰에 오신 것을 환영합니다! 경찰이나 도둑의 삶을 살게 됩니다. 범죄를 멈추거나 저지르는 거죠. 법을 수호하거나 법을 어기거나. 이 세계에서 선택은 여러분의 몫입니다. 

최근 업데이트... 
💰 네 개의 은행! 강도 사건마다 임의로 선택됨! 
💎 새로워진 보석 상점! 
💎 보석 상점 총 6층! 강도 사건마다 임의로 세 개의 층이 선택됨! 
💰 주유소와 도넛 가게 강도로 세 배의 캐시를 획득! 
🎮 [VIP 서버] 플레이어 수가 충분할 시 강도 대기 시간 단축! 

섬네일: @ID0ntHaveAUse와 Roblox! 

아래의 SNS 링크를 팔로우하여 업데이트 소식을 미리 받아보세요!"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1023594,"totalDownVotes":51595,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":25131,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Check the in-game update log in new servers (the book with the !) for full details!

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3236200,"totalDownVotes":283830,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":27921,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.9.6
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1191357,"totalDownVotes":68000,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":19057,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":663114,"totalDownVotes":128600,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":10270,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":699429,"totalDownVotes":94676,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🦌 [DESERT BOSS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":15621,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Islands!

👑 Creators:

spleenhook (https://twitter.com/spleenhook)

🥁Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":145744,"totalDownVotes":8016,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":9932,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":188998,"totalDownVotes":31036,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ BLEACH ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":9272,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":912341,"totalDownVotes":118767,"universeId":892043755,"name":"[🏆UPDATE + SALE🏆] Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":9908,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🚨 UPDATE 75 🚨

🥚 New egg in the Shadow Realm (Corrupted Egg)
🐶 16 new pets!
🔥 ??
💰 60% off sale on all gamepasses!
💸 50% off sale on all boosts!
🐰 Easter event has ended! We hope you enjoyed our biggest egg hunt yet
🎮 Bug fixes for gamepad auto-hatch.

Subscribe to the Rumble Studios YouTube channel to redeem exclusive rewards, including a special pet, more inventory space, and free boosts! 👍 Tutorial: https://youtu.be/NweUYpsrS3c

Welcome to Bubble Gum Simulator! Blow bubbles to reach new heights in the clouds. Sell your bubbles or collect coins to buy upgrades! Hatch pets as companions to help you on your adventure.

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":7083660,"creatorName":"StealthWhale","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":45100,"totalDownVotes":4856,"universeId":2383988292,"name":"[10xHONEY] 🐝 Beeface: Be a Bee!","placeId":6410967163,"playerCount":24695,"imageToken":"T_6410967163_718b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"📢 WORLD 16 AT 55K LIKES!
📢 UPDATE: You can now buy 10x honey multiplier in "misc" section of shop!
📢 UPDATE: Co-op is here! Friends can now work on each other's plot!
📢 UPDATE: DIVINE BEE has appeared! World 14 is out! 🐮 You can now buy eggs and more bee slots! 

👍 LIKE IF YOU WANT MORE UPDATES!

FEATURES: 
🐝 Experience the busy life of a bee! 
🍯 Collect pollen, turn it into honey and expand your plot! 
🌸 Thousands of flowers await you! 
👑 Show your skills and become the Queen Bee!

Please join our group to stay tuned 🙂 https://www.roblox.com/groups/7083660/StealthWhale"},{"creatorId":3732983,"creatorName":"polandgamebuilders","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":66246,"totalDownVotes":13298,"universeId":943733974,"name":"🎉Bit Event 2🎉   Bitcoin Miner [Beta]","placeId":2629642516,"playerCount":7538,"imageToken":"T_2629642516_7060","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Bitcoin Miner, in this game you can mine bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies, upgrade new cards, buy new mining devices and many other.


🚧Game still under construction so expect new Updates soon.


💡New game updates coming soon!
- ❗ Quest Sytem Rework!
- 💱 Exchanger revamp!



📕update log 📕
- 🎉 Bit Event 2!
- 🖥️ New Change Card Ui!
- 🌿 New Decorations
- 🔊 Some Sound effects!
- ⚙️ Bug Fixes!


Note: This is just a simulation, all cryptocurrencies are ONLY in-game items, NOT connected to real world ones

⬇️ Check Social links for new Update info

Ps. Sorry but we won't add Dogecoin to this game. We always try to do what players want but adding Dogecoin is impossible for many reasons."},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":517230,"totalDownVotes":42436,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":11530,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"[HINWEIS: DIESES SPIEL BEFINDET SICH NOCH IN DER BETA, DAS HEIßT ES GIBT NOCH BUGS.]
In dieser Welt, kann niemand alleine überleben. Verbünde dich mit Freunden um gegen zahlreiche Wellen von Zombies zu kämpfen. Kämpfe gegen Bosse, verdiene Münzen, steiger dein Level, und kaufe dir neue Truppen! Wenn du für eine Herausforderung bereit bist, dann versuch dein können gegen härtere Bosse auf härteren Schwierigkeitsgraden!

👥💵Trete der Gruppe bei um +$100 mehr Startergeld zu bekommen! www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
👍Lasse einen Like da und favorisiere das Spiel für mehr qualitativ hochwertige Updates!🌟

 🛠️UPDATES🛠️
+ TEMPLAR BOSS 💥
+ FRÜHLINGS LOBBY 🌼
+ SCHADESINDIKATOREN
+ SOLO MODUS BUFF
+ ZOMBIE BUFFS
+ FEHLERBEHEBUNGEN 🛠️


Vollständiges Update-Log: devforum.roblox.com/t/tower-defense-simulator-update-log

Credits: 
Haupt Developer/Designer: BelowNatural 
Scripter: Razuatix
Erbauer: BiscuitTurtleKid & Beefchoplets 
Musik Komponist: Phoqus"},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2330184,"totalDownVotes":244882,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":29587,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:
Pick up items / Use items - Click (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or Right Trigger (Controller)
Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 9, Chapter 11 Builder, Additional Chapter 8 Building, Book 2 Chapter 2 and 5 Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1798409,"totalDownVotes":140414,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":6505,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]

Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.

cash drop takes 30%

⚠️ This game is not complete and some features are missing.

⚠️ This is a large game and lower end PCs, laptops, phones, and tablets may experience performance issues.

Controls
- "V" to toggle walk/jog, hold "Shift" to run
- Semi & Auto: "E" to upshift, "Q" to downshift ("X" and "Y" on Xbox)
- Manual: Use the "Shift" key ("RB" on Xbox) to control clutch while shifting
- Hold left-CTRL while accelerating to wheelie on a bike
- Cops & criminals have to enable PvP (bottom right) in order to do damage

Developed by Strigid
